revised_title: Industrial Applications of Acoustic Microscopy: Techniques and Advancements
tldr: This article presents the development of a scanning acoustic microscopy system for industrial applications, capable of inspecting materials and processes on a practical scale for automated manufacturing. The system utilizes acoustic microscopy techniques to evaluate the elastic structure of materials' surfaces and subsurfaces. The advancements include reliable detection of surface-breaking cracks, improved imaging accuracy, increased magnification, and the ability to inspect volumes and interior surfaces. Practical applications include inspecting aircraft engine materials and semiconductor power devices.
